page.title: 10People Of Coalville:
page.content: {Tom Cobbley:} Tom Cobbley has lived in Coalville for twenty years. Over these years children's manners have changed, nowadays children do and say what they like;"corporal punishment should still be used," says Tom. Tom thinks there should be more entertainment in Coalville to keep young people off the streets. {Mr. Armson:} Mr. Armson has lived in Coalville for thirty years. He started work down{South Leicester}pit when he was fourteen, he worked there for fifty two years. Around our school, there used to be no houses, just fields. There is enough entertainment in Coalville, but unfortunately some of the youngsters abuse it. If there was a major disaster, he said people wouldn't help as they are too proud.
